text: James Corden performs'Mary Poppins'as a Crosswalk Musical in London By Hayley Bradbrook James Corden took his fan - favourite Crosswalk : The Musical segment from his Late Late Show to the streets of London this week. The 38 - year - old star and his “ theatre ensemble ” performed a hilarious production of Mary Poppins for confused motorists. The talk show host played the titular character, made famous by Dame Julie Andrews, while Sir Ben Kingsley took on the role of the lovable chimney sweep Bert. ` ` When [ James ] told me about the idea, of course, I jumped at the chance.
